name: Anatidae
description:
Anatidae is a precision platform game about a little duck with amazing skills. Your objective is catch the max golden eggs that you can! Do you have what it takes to go through all the challenges?

In Anatidae, you'll need to think fast and use your disponible skills to pass the obstacles. Find secret passages and be quick to escape from death. You'll no longer trust walls after playing!

Features:

  • 80+ levels: Over eighty challenging and trapped levels!
  • 21 skins: Twenty-one different skins for you to display through the levels!
  • 10 mechanics: Ten different mechanics that combined form great challenges!
